ing: 1/2 cup Original Unsweetened Almond Breeze Almondmilk Coconutmilk Blend
n: Almond Flour Pancakes from Almond BreezeÂ®
des: "These easy and delicious pancakes are made with almond flour, blended almondmilk and coconut milk, maple syrup, and cinnamon for a new family favorite breakfast."
ins:
In a medium bowl, mix all ingredients.
In a non-stick skillet over medium-low heat, scoop 1/4 cup spoonfuls of batter into pan.
Cook 3 to 4 minutes or until golden brown, then flip and cook an additional 1 to 2 minutes on the other side.
Serve with fresh fruit & maple syrup.
